function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impacting people's lives and businesses","Impact":"Tragic health consequences, suspension of businesses, and physical distancing","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety measures, support for affected businesses, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, hygiene monitoring sensors, and vaccine development","People":"General population, business owners, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and businesses"},{"Description":"Threats to the validity of energy social science research","Impact":"Challenges in ensuring data validity, representation, and comparability before and after the pandemic","Mitigation":"Adapt research design, collect extra contextual detail, and consider the impacts of the pandemic on findings","Technologies":"Data analytics for context-specific analysis, adaptive research methodologies, and remote data collection tools","People":"Energy social science researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and funding organizations"}]}
